title: A Bug on vayne's E
body: So, When i was testing out vayne, i found out the bug that if you stand still and auto something (like dragon) and you use E, vayne won't be able to auto attack for about 1-2 second and just wiggles. I tried it several times on dragon, and it just happends everytime and i think this is a problem ：） Riot fix it!

replies.body: This is the Alpha boards homie - you're lookin' for gameplay :)
